ad_text: Orcas Freight Sponsored Orcas Freight is looking for a CDL driver with a Class-A license. This position is for our off-island route - perfect for someone living in the Anacortes/Mt Vernon Area. The job starts in Anacortes each morning around 5:30 am driving to Kent/Auburn to pickup freight and then back to Anacortes. The driver is generally done each day around 3:30 pm. Check out the job description at orcasfreight.com and apply online. FULL-TIME · $30 / HOUR · ORCAS, WASHINGTON Class A Commercial Drivers License Truck Driver Apply now
